headline: QXO Upsizes Convertible Preferred Equity Placement to $3 Billion
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., January 12, 2026--QXO, Inc. (NYSE: QXO) (the "Company" or "QXO") today announced a $1.8 billion increase to its previously announced $1.2 billion financing led by funds managed by affiliates of Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE: APO) ("Apollo"), bringing the total investment in QXO to $3 billion.
